decision_conditions: During the course of the demolition works and immediately following demolition works, photographic records shall be kept and made available to the Council when requested to do so, detailing the works.Reason: To comply with the terms of the Planning Condition and to ensure special regard is paid to protecting the special architectural and historic interest and integrity of the building under Section 16 of the Planning (Listed Buildings and Conservation Areas) Act 1990, and to ensure that no damage is caused to the part of the building which is to be retained.
description: Details required for Condition 4 (Demolition and Precautionary Details) of 21/02703/LBC (Installation of new deck to the London End of the footbridge above platform 3/4 at station including alteration to the public stair case at the southern side and other associated works to station)Before any demolition works begin, details shall be approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority to ensure that precautions are taken to secure and protect the interior and exterior features during the building work. The agreed measures shall be carried out in full. No such features shall be disturbed or removed temporarily or permanently except as indicated on the approved drawings or without the prior approval in writing of the Local Planning Authority. Particular regard should be given to the following item(s) but it should be noted this list is not exhaustive:- stair balusters and handrails;- original tiles;- original crittall windows and glass rooflights;- original signage;- vulnerable surfaces including flooring and finishesReason: To ensure that special regard is paid to protecting the special architectural and historic interestand integrity of the building under Section 16 of the Planning (Listed Buildings and ConservationAreas) Act 1990, and to ensure that no damage is caused to the part of the building which is to beretained.Please find attached the Demolition Information Report
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
